name: Fayette (dutchlish)
description:
Fayette

NOTES: 

1. Please download stand-alone build for best experience.

2. Controller HIGHLY recommended.

3. If you beat the final boss the game bugs out and you can't see the player. That's the end of the game for now as no time to fix. 

A mini-metroidvania made for the Metroidvania Month game jam.

There will doubtless be bugs, wasn't enough time for significant play testing. 

Planning to keep working on it, so any feedback appreciated. 

A full version would feature rogue-lite/like elements like permadeath. For ease of playing through the game, the respawning in this version is mostly very generous.

Credits: 

Game design and code - Mike Bailey

Character - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warrior-free-asset-195707
